actions.supported_actions:
You look around, the swamp is endless, 
but your sight is restricted by the light mist that lingers and snakes around the towering trees.
The mist crests at head height, its smokey tendrils reached up trying to grab the low lying branches

You lift each foot up as you try to stop yourself 
sinking too deep into the in the water logged mud. You can feel the cold seeping in through your clothes, you can't remain standing much longer

You adjust your bracers, tightening up the lace. 
You can feel the material tearing slightly at the hoops
